channel.title: Help-all my weps are 2handed
channel.description: Ok guys on my source (Devolution V7) I somehow made it so ALL the weapons are 2handed,even the ones that are supposed to be onehanded.. ive tryd getting a new twohanded.dat but it didnt work.. can anyone help me>?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 08:51:04 am[/size][hr]No-one can help me? :(
